articles.description: The four-day practice game will be played at the County Ground in Northamptonshire in July later this year.
articles.content: In an unprecedented build-up schedule for an overseas Test series, India will take on India A in a four-day practice match when the two sides travel to England later this year. The game will be playe… [+1244 chars]
